title: Topic 001 Question 096
body: An Amazon EC2 administrator created the following policy associated with an IAM group containing several users:
/Amazon AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate SAA-C03 Exam Practice Questions/img/image1.png
What is the effect of this policy?
options: Users can terminate an EC2 instance in any AWS Region except us-east-1.
Users can terminate an EC2 instance with the IP address 10.100.100.1 in the us-east-1 Region.
Users can terminate an EC2 instance in the us-east-1 Region when the user's source IP is 10.100.100.254.
Users cannot terminate an EC2 instance in the us-east-1 Region when the user's source IP is 10.100.100.254.
